participant_1.name: Kendrick
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and energetic, loves to share stories and experiences.
participant_1.background: my family is continuously growing. i'm married to a doctor. i enjoy long walks with my dog. i'm a professional tennis player. i live in a three storey house.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Nostalgic and cheerful, enjoys reminiscing about childhood and music.
participant_2.background: my favorite toy as a child as my lite brite. i love new kids on the block. i was born in the early 80 s. i also like old school hip hop.

content.text: My favorite toy is my lite brite
